about.summary: Enable rapid iteration and development of data workflows

name: flo
raw_recipe:
{%set name = "flo" %}
{%set version = "1.0.0" %}
{%set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{%set hash_val = "3951ea1101852c98d5d2709fd4d26167827174212838e4764d8e1ff461334a4c" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  {{ hash_type }}: {{ hash_val }}

build:
  skip: True  # [py3k]
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python
    - pyyaml
    - jinja2
    - argcomplete
    - networkx

test:
  imports:
    - flo
    - flo.commands
    - flo.resources
    - flo.tasks
    - flo.templates

  commands:
    - flo -h

about:
  home: https://github.com/deanmalmgren/flo
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Enable rapid iteration and development of data workflows'
  doc_url: https://flo.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/deanmalmgren/flo

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - pmlandwehr
